tasks.label: npm: build
tasks.detail:
./node_modules/clean-css-cli/bin/cleancss -o n-carousel.min.css n-carousel.css
./node_modules/terser/bin/terser -o n-carousel.min.js --compress --mangle -- n-carousel.js
./node_modules/terser/bin/terser -o n-carousel-preload.min.js --compress --mangle -- n-carousel-preload.js
gzip-size --raw n-carousel.min.css > n-carousel.min.css.size
gzip-size --raw n-carousel.min.js > n-carousel.min.js.size
gzip-size --raw n-carousel-preload.min.js > n-carousel-preload.min.js.size
